scalar:array.comment: /** * Smarty Resource Plugin * * @package Smarty * @subpackage TemplateResources * @author Rodney Rehm */
/** * Smarty Resource Plugin * * Wrapper Implementation for custom resource plugins * * @package Smarty * @subpackage TemplateResources */

/** * fetch template and its modification time from data source * * @param string $name template name * @param string &$source template source * @param integer &$mtime template modification timestamp (epoch) */

/** * Fetch template's modification timestamp from data source * * {@internal implementing this method is optional. * Only implement it if modification times can be accessed faster than loading the complete template source.}} * * @param string $name template name * @return integer|boolean timestamp (epoch) the template was modified, or false if not found */
/** * populate Source Object with meta data from Resource * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @param Smarty_Internal_Template $_template template object */

/** * Load template's source into current template object * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @return string template source * @throws SmartyException if source cannot be loaded */
/** * Determine basename for compiled filename * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @return string resource's basename */
/** * Smarty Resource Plugin * * @package Smarty * @subpackage TemplateResources * @author Rodney Rehm */
/** * Smarty Resource Plugin * * Wrapper Implementation for custom resource plugins * * @package Smarty * @subpackage TemplateResources */
